Reviews.Title: Work Great
Reviews.Author: chuckiey2k "chuckiey2k"
Reviews.Content: I am using it with 2 Tom Top wireless IP Cameras and a power supply panel.  I had to get a 1.35mm Plug Converter Set for 2.1mm x 5.5mm Power Extension Cable which I also purchased from Amazon.  I am loving the way that it all worked out great.

Reviews.Title: Used for additional cable for security system
Reviews.Author: Grayfurnaceman
Reviews.Content: 3 stars for not telling me the adapters were not for adding length to existing cable (they all give the same useless adapters).  I am not sold on these types of cable.  There is a lot of loss of quality if you have to go any length.  These cables are not singled out, they are all poor.  It would seem that RG59U might work better, but not sure.

ProductInfo.Features:
100% Copper made; quality Assured.
Two pieces of BNC to RCA converters are provided for each cable to connect to a camera with RCA connection.
The 33 Feet video power cable will allow you to transmit video signal and supply DC power for all kind of security   cameras.
Ready for Plug and play. Each cable comes with BNC video connector and 2.1 mm center positive power plug at each end.
2 Pack and 4 Pack are also offered for your choice.
ProductInfo.Name: SainSonic 4 Pack 33 Feet 10M Digital Video Power Security Camera Cable for CCTV Surveillance, DVR Camera Power & BNC Video Cable with FREE BNC to RCA Connectors
